name: Mining Explorer
short_description:
Application features

-Ability to use certain input peripherals, smartphones and tablets to mine (see help file for the complete list)
-Ability to split power to several workers and pools
-Ability to split single mining source between multiple cryptocoins
-Monitoring of the Bitcoin`s rate
-Monitoring of the worker`s status (online/offline)
-Monitoring of the pool score
-Monitoring of the other settings, which pools give back on statistics
-The time of the last share, the time of connecting to the pool, etc. is taken into account the time zone on your computer
-Ability to save the width and position of the table columns

List of the supported pools:

Mining Explorer has been reconfigured to support most if not all cryptocoin mining pools. Please send incompatibility reports to miningexplorer@gmail.com.

Supported languages

-English
-Russian
-German
Try to translate to Japanese
